document_data.name: Hael
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Hael''' was the member of the [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Council of Lords]] in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's desttruction.
document_data.Activities:
Years of exposure to mind-affecting drugs and [[spell]]s from both [[Manshoon]] and [[Fzoul Chembryl]] left Lord Hael an old mumbling fool whose only contributions to the Council was to raise his hand for votes in favor of the desires of the [[Zhentarim]] or [[Church of Bane]].

Hael's estate was located in the eastern section of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] on [[Rogues' Way]] and the [[Street of Bones]].
document_data.Relationships: Hael's only son eagerly awaited his demise so he could take his seat on the Council.
